file_content.text: As requested: Samovan Bann.
Samovan Bann will never trouble anyone again.
What's the news on Samovan Bann?
Got a present for you, Tam.
Here, Tam. Proof of partial completion.
Are you the client?
That's it, then. No more reign of terror for that ex-Czerka piece of aurodium-plated trash.
He's really dead? He's really dead. Him and his Black Sun franchise plans. Good riddance.
You haven't heard? Ever since his people were yanked out of the picture, Bann's been stepping up the violence in their place.
One less Black Sun bottom feeder off the streets. Works for me.
Got one dead instead of alive, in other words? Music to my ears.
Don't look like I could afford to put out a bounty, is that it? Well, truth be told, I can't. Not on a custodian's pay.
Name's Tam Daral. I represent a bunch of folk like myself--people who lost loved ones to those no-good Black Sun thugs.
Some former Czerka exec, Samovan Bann--he wants to revamp Black Sun into a galactic franchise. People working for him are brutal.
I'll make sure these lowlifes are brought to justice.
I'll avenge them for you.
I know how to deal with criminals like Black Sun: mercilessly.
They're goners.
Are you asking me to hunt down the entire organization?
Which Black Suns am I after?
Good. Doesn't matter how much you dole out to them, they've got it coming. Watch yourself, though.
You ask around, you'll find the particular scum I'm talking about.
Only other thing I can think to say is, you know, "good luck." So, good luck. I'll be here.
Justice. A little justice would mean the world to me right now. But a word of caution before you do your thing.
Me and the rest of us working stiffs thank you.
Raiding local businesses. Firebombing homes. Anything he can do to scare us into submission. And from everything I hear, he's loving every second of it.
An electrician who lost her kids in one of those fires got a bead on Bann's location. Go get him. Make him pay.
I wish my partner could've been here to share this moment, but you can't have it all, right? Thanks for this.
